alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 2:18AM PDT until April 04 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT /11 AM PDT/ TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT /11 PM PDT/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Oregon and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From noon MDT /11 AM PDT/ today to midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will create blowing dust which will reduce visibility. In the Snake Plain the strongest winds will be in the late afternoon and early evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
